channel.title: Posts on Yilda's Bookshelf
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Yilda's Bookshelf

item.title: 2021: Year in Books (So Far)
item.description: An ongoing list of novels I’ve read this year. Crime and Punishment, Fyodor Dostoyevsky. ★ ★ ★ ★ The Poppy War, R.F. Kuang, The Poppy War #1. ★ ★ ★ ¼ The Fifth Season, N.K. Jemisin, The Broken Earth #1. ★ ★ ★ ★ ½ The Last Hero, Terry Pratchett, Discworld #27. ★ ★ ★ The Song of Achilles, Madeline Miller.

item.title: 2020: Year in Books
item.description: Just a list of novels I read in 2020. It was a good year for discovering high fantasy series (or getting around to reading famous ones)! Oathbringer, Brandon Sanderson, The Stormlight Archive #3. ★ ★ ★ ★ ½ The Lies of Locke Lamora, Scott Lynch, The Gentlemen Bastards #1. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Red Seas Under Red Skies, Scott Lynch, The Gentlemen Bastards #2.
